ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: well, there could be others, but sadly, we don t have much in our group.... Dracona said.... you could go out with me to look for more members, though..

"well, there could be others, but sadly, we don't have much in our group...=
." Dracona said.... "you could go out with me to look for more members, tho=
ugh.." Dracona said to Wrath and Kamodia.....
  ----- Original Message ----=
- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, Ma=
y 31, 2000 12:04 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Wrath stared confuse=
d and Kamodia smiled and waved back* Wrath: Well, What should we do first? =
Any missions that done? Kamodia: Any other bots I can meet? *Kamodia said h=
oping Dracona said yes*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE=
 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:39 PM
    S=
ubject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    "now that your with us, understand that we=
 don't fight Maximals, we only fight Alliance and sometimes the Predacons, =
we're in this to end this war...." Dracona pointed out.. "i'm Dracona, that=
's Plintissa, she's talking to the core consiousness of Suukie, and those a=
re the Radicons, Stranato, Arrow, Stronghold, Airbomber, Scamrock, and Trai=
n Wreck...." Dracona pointed out....The Radicons stopped strangling each ot=
her and waved to Wrath and Kamodia......
      ----- Original Message -----=
 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Tu=
esday, May 30, 2000 6:27 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      *Wrat=
h Kamodia payed very much attention to everything Dracona showed them*
    =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg=
@egroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:21 PM
        Subject: =
Re: Neo Beast Wars


        Dracona smiled... "great, we needed members..t=
he radicons looked at each other angily....with one punch Scamrock knocked =
down Arrow, but dracona stopped the fight quickly......Dracona pointed out =
the secrets of the base to Wrath and Kamodia, like the secret passagewaay a=
nd stuff.....
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilove=
alllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, May =
30, 2000 6:15 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          *Wrath a=
nd Kamodia begin walking around looking at all the CR Chamber's and Compute=
r's* Kamodia: Well, I seem to like it. Wrath: It didn't take us too long to=
 get in here. *They both turned to Dracona* Kamodia: I wish to join. Wrath:=
 Count me in for that.
            ----- Original Message ----- 
          =
  From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Tues=
day, May 30, 2000 5:30 PM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


       =
     "yes, you can join us, the People's Group!..." Dracona said..... "come=
 on, we'll show you, but promise not to ever let this slip out......" Draco=
na said.....Dracona put a blindfold on Wrath and Kamodia and (with Orchid's=
 permission only, if Orchid doesn't like this then it doesn't have to happe=
n, just wanted to quicken things...) took them through the secret passagewa=
y..... "thiss is the base....it's all underground...." Dracona said, removi=
ng the blindfolds from Wrath and Kamodia.....
              ----- Original =
Message ----- 
              From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
              Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:36 AM
          =
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              *Wrath and Kamodia turned t=
o look* Wrath: Do you know where we can get a job? *Wrath asked to Dracona*=
 *Wrath said as he and Kamodia walked up to Dracona* *Kamodia smiled as she=
 got her wish of meeting some more bots*
                ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
                From: THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
                Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:24 AM
               =
 Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                Dracona and company finishe =
repairing all except for suukie, wgo was injured too bad and would take a l=
ong time to repair..Plintissa, much to Dracona's anger, had forgotten about=
 their mission and stayed to talk to Suukie....the Radicons and Dracona cam=
e from the secret passage way when nobody could possibly see, and walked of=
f searching for some members......the Radicons bickered among themselves an=
d Dracona studied the landscape..Dracona saw Wrath and Kamodia.. "hey, you =
2, over here!..." Dracona said, calling out Wrath and Kamodia......the Radi=
cons drew their blasters and stood guard, Scamrock laughed and played with =
his thumbs......Dracona showed her hands empty to show that she came in pea=
ce....she waved to Wrath and Kamodia.....
                  ----- Original =
Message ----- 
                  From: ilovealllizards 
                  T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 9:12 PM=

                  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  *Kamodia=
 thought she saw something for a minute but figures its all in her mond con=
tinues walking on*
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
              From: THECODE 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
                  Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 6:43 AM
                    Su=
bject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                    Plintissa looks in the dist=
ance and spots Wrath and Kamodia....Plintissa knows the would be good for t=
he People's Group, but no wway she could invite them with these idiot Truth=
s surrounding her!......she ushers to Wrath and Kamodia, hoping they'll see=
......
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
                =
      From: ilovealllizards 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
                      Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 2:15 AM
                  =
    Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                      *Wrath and Kamodia stil=
l stand on the outside of the Maximal base* Wrath: HEEEEYYYY!! WE WANT A JO=
B!!! *Wrath yells at the top of his lungs* *Than he notices Kamodia walking=
 away* Wrath: Where are you going? Kamodia: I'm not sticking around here wh=
en they don't want us. Wrath: How do you know that they don't? Kamodia: If =
they really wanted us than they'd answer us. *Kamodia turns and walks on lo=
oking for another base* *Wrath stands there thinking about what Komodia sai=
d and comes to the fact that she's right* Wrath: Hey wait up! *Wrath comes =
running up and catches up with Kamodia* Kamodia: What made you leave? *She =
says giving off a sly grin* Wrath: I came to the fact that I'm too good for=
 that dump. Kamodia: Come on, admit it! I'm right. If they really wanted us=
 then they would've answered us. *Wrath doesn't answer and keeps looking fo=
ward* Kamodia: Your just mad because you know I'm right but you are right a=
bout that place being a dump. *They contiue walking on*
